instructions: Prepare pasta salad according to package directions. Stir in pepperoni, tomatoes and olives; toss to mix well. Cover; refrigerate.
title: Peppy Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1 (7.75 ounce) package Betty Crocker® Suddenly Salad® classic pasta salad mix
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained
